category: Referee Committee Regulations/Article 16 (Referee Registration and Activities)
contents: Article 16 (Referee Registration and Activities) ① A person who wishes to act as a referee must obtain referee qualifications and then complete referee registration in accordance with Articles 8 and 25 of the Player Registration Regulations. Revised December 27, 2021. ② Only persons registered as referees in accordance with Paragraph 1 may act as referees for the relevant member sport organization. ③ If the qualification information of the referee registered pursuant to paragraph 1 is changed, the referee qualification information may be changed after deliberation by the member sport organization. ④ Cancellation of a referee’s registration shall follow Article 28 of the Player Registration Regulations. Revised 2021. 12. 27. [Fully revised 2019. 11. 7.]
